name: Butter
description: Butter is the first token on Solana's hackathon winning token launch suite Tatami. Launched with close coordination, Butter token is an experimental venture that will strive to display the full array of possibilities of token launches on Solana including token options and on chain governance with negligible voting costs. $Butter serves as the governance token for the Butter DAO that will drive the "Only Possible on Solana" initiatives for the community.
